summary: The diff shows WeaponViewModel.tsx was redesigned with detailed weapon models for pistol (Glock-style), shotgun (Mossberg/Remington pump-action), and assault rifle (AK-47). The file summary confirms all major features described in REQ-1 through REQ-4 are present. The diff is truncated so full verification of every acceptance criterion is limited, but the summary text is comprehensive and aligns well with requirements. No hallucinated features were identified.
